data.title: Who Are Famous Homeschoolers in History?
data.meta_description: Homeschoolers accomplish amazing things! Who are famous homeschoolers and what have they done? Read on to find out how some of the most famous...
data.text:
When you choose to homeschool, you may feel as though you’re out on an island doing the uncommon. But, the truth is, you’re in great company! From elite athletes to politicians to artists, famous homeschoolers are among the most important and talented in our history. Just see for yourself with this list of the most famous homeschoolers.

Are you interested in homeschool? Learn more about Bridgeway’s Pre-K homeschool programs, elementary homeschool programs, middle school homeschool programs, and high school homeschool programs.

Homeschooling Presidents

Some of the most famous homeschoolers in our history have been Presidents. U.S. Presidents who were homeschooled include John Adams, John Quincy Adams, James Garfield, William, Andrew Jackson, Thomas Jefferson, Abraham Lincoln, James Polk, Franklin Delano Roosevelt, Theodore Roosevelt, and George Washington.

Homeschooling now is even easier than it was for these presidents. Live online homeschool classes connect students with teachers and other students as well as virtual communities of homeschoolers worldwide! Did you know we also offer a Homeschool Associate’s Degree program? You can work directly with college professors and plan to graduate with a high school diploma and an Associate Degree.

Current Famous Homeschoolers

• Tim Tebow– NFL Quarterback and Motivational Speaker

• Justin Bieber– Musician

• Bethany Hamilton– Professional Surfer

• Arran Fernandez– Mathematician, Young Prodigy

• Emma Watson– Actress famous for her role in Harry Potter series

• Julian Trevelyan– Young Concert Pianist

• Esperanza Spalding– Grammy Winning Musician and Child Prodigy

• Venus and Serena Williams– Professional Tennis Players

• Condoleeza Rice– Former Secretary of State

• Sage Katsenberg– Olympic Snowboarder

Learn more about online schools for athletes.

View our detailed list of current athletes that were homeschooled!

Is your child an elite athlete or performer? Learn more about homeschooling the famous or child star or performer with Bridgeway Academy.
